data.message: V6 Radical Expression technique: Use split-screen compositions with cards that physically overlap the dividing boundary. This creates visual tension and breaks conventional dashboard layouts. Key elements: giant watermark text (240px) as graphic element, scattered floating avatars at different scales for depth, editorial typography as brand whisper, mixed material palette (white/dark/coral gradients). Use group type instead of frame for absolute positioning in Pencil when flexbox interferes.
